sentences.en: He waded into the water to push the boat out.
sentences.cn: 他蹚进水里把船推出来。

sentences.en: He was aiming the rifle at Wade.
sentences.cn: 他将步枪瞄准了韦德。

sentences.en: Her mother came to find them, wading across a river to reach them.
sentences.cn: 她的母亲蹚过河来找他们。

sentences.en: Let me say it again. I despised Wade's life.
sentences.cn: 我再说一遍。我厌恶韦德的生活方式。

sentences.en: Mr Wade answers both questions with a qualified yes.
sentences.cn: 韦德先生对两个问题给出了不完全肯定的回答。

sentences.en: Rescuers had to wade across a river to reach them.
sentences.cn: 救援者必须蹚过一条河才能靠近他们。

sentences.en: Sometimes they had to wade waist-deep through mud.
sentences.cn: 有时他们得通过齐腰深的泥浆。

sentences.en: The lake was not frozen sufficiently to bear her; neither was it open, nor low enough that she could wade through it; and across it she must go if she would find her child!
sentences.cn: 湖上还没有足够的厚冰可以托住她，但是水又不够浅，她不能涉水走过去。 不过，假如她要找到她的孩子的话，她必须走过这个湖。

sentences.en: Wade exhaled a cloud of smoke and coughed.
sentences.cn: 韦德吐出一口烟，然后咳嗽起来。

sentences.en: Wade placed his chilled hands on the radiator and warmed them.
sentences.cn: 韦德把冰凉的双手放在暖气片上取暖。

sentences.en: Wade released the hand brake and pulled away from the curb.
sentences.cn: 韦德松开手刹驶离路边。

sentences.en: Wade resisted an impulse to smile.
sentences.cn: 韦德强忍住想笑的冲动。

sentences.en: Wade stepped inside and closed the inner door behind him.
sentences.cn: 韦德走进去，随手带上了里面的门。

sentences.en: Wade stuck the cigarette between his lips.
sentences.cn: 韦德把香烟叼在嘴里。

sentences.en: Wade walked quickly to the refrigerator and pulled out another beer.
sentences.cn: 韦德快步走到冰箱边又拿出一罐啤酒。

sentences.en: Wade was a hearty, bluff, athletic sort of guy.
sentences.cn: 韦德是个精力充沛、率直、运动型的人。

sentences.en: Wade was going to be paid a salary, instead of by the hour, whether he put in forty hours or not.
sentences.cn: 会按月给韦德开工资，而不是按小时，无论他是否工作了40个小时。

sentences.en: Wade was smart and not bad-looking, and he could be funny when he wanted to.
sentences.cn: 韦德脑子聪明，相貌也不难看，而且如果他愿意的话还很风趣。

sentences.en: waded into the task.
sentences.cn: 投入到工作中

sentences.en: We had to wade the river Genal and then climb out of the valley to get to Juzcar.
sentences.cn: 我们必须蹚过赫纳尔河，爬出山谷，才能到达朱斯卡。

words.tran_cn: [鸟] 涉禽；涉水者，跋涉者；长筒防水靴
涉水（wade的ing形式）；艰难地通过
跋涉；可涉水而过的地方
开始工作,努力工作,埋头于...

phrases.tran_cn: vt. 插手，介入；猛烈攻击
精力充沛地做：决然并充满精力地投入、开始或攻击
精神饱满地开始；猛烈攻击
涉水（泥泞等）；费力地做完；艰难地通过

trans.tran_cn: 跋涉；可涉水而过的地方

trans.tran_en: to walk through water that is not deep
to walk through water that is not deep
